name: color
description:
enable/disable: enables or disables the command.
color: assigns a premade color to you. available colors: alizarin, pomegranate, carrot, pumpkin, sunflower, orange, turquoise, greensea, emerald, nephritis, peterriver, belizehole, amethyst, wisteria.
hex: assigns a custom color to you. hex color code expected (e.G. #12dce3).

name: removecolor
description: remove a color role from yourself.

name: 8ball
description: ask 8ball a question.

name: drop
description: drops a random rap line. optional: add argument to send 1-10 lines.

name: fuck
description: well.. says fuck you.

name: stfricku
description: tell someone to shut the frick up.

name: stfu
description: tell someone to shut the fuck up.

name: achievement
description:
create a minecraft achievement image. 
seperate text (and optional icon, acry$ achievementicons for a list of icons) with a |. example: acry$ achievement i'm an achievement text[| 1-45]

name: achievementicons
description: lists all icons you can use for acry$ achievement.

name: amiajoke
description:
creates a 'am i a joke to you?' meme. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: awooify
description:
awooify someone. 
@user: mention of user you want to awooify.

name: baguette
description:
baguette. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: blurpify
description:
blurpify an image. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: captcha
description:
recaptcha with an custom image and title.
imgurl: image url, name: name for the image

name: cat
description: drops a random cat image.

name: changemymind
description:
change my mind. 
text: your opinion.

name: clyde
description:
clyde. 
text: text to clydify.

name: deepfry
description:
deepfry an image. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: dog
description: drops a random dog image.

name: drake
description:
create a drake meme. 
seperate top and bottom text with a |. example: acry$ drake i'm a top text|i'm a bottom text

name: fact
description:
display your fax. 
text: the fact, man. your fax.

name: iphonex
description:
fills an iphone with an image. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: jpeg
description:
jpegify an image. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: kannagen
description:
kannagen. 
text: text to kannafy.

name: lolice
description:
lolice chief. 
@user: mention of user you want to lolice.

name: magik
description:
image magik woo. 
url: image url, intensity: magik intensity between 1-10

name: pornhub
description:
create a pornhub text image. 
seperate top and bottom text with a |. example: acry$ pornhub porn|hub

name: sadcat
description: drops a random sad cat image.

name: ship
description:
ship two users. 
@user1: first user mention, @user2: second user mention

name: threats
description:
the 3 biggest threats to society. 
img: image url or attatched image

name: trumptweet
description:
create a trump tweet. 
text: text to trumptweet.

name: whowouldwin
description:
who of the two users would win?. 
@user1: first user mention, @user2: second user mention

name: avatar
description: returns the avatar of the mentioned user.

name: help
description: lists all commands.

name: invite
description: get the discord bots invite link.

name: server
description: shows information about a server.

name: stats
description: shows bot statistics

name: user
description: shows information about a user

name: blacklist
description: blacklist or unblacklist someone from joining voicechat or a server. requires KICK_MEMBERS permission.

name: blacklisted
description: list the blacklisted users on a server. requires KICK_MEMBERS permission.

name: clear
description: clear x amount of messages. requires MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.

name: goodbye
description: enables goodbye messages/sets a goodbye message channel. requires ADMINISTRATOR permission.

name: verification
description: adds verification to channel or selects role for verification. requires MANAGE_CHANNELS permission.

name: welcome
description: enables welcome messages/sets a welcome message channel. requires ADMINISTRATOR permission.

name: char
description: returns a random available character

name: claim
description: claim a  character

name: inv
description: shows your inventory

name: trade
description: trade a character with another user
